terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Shark Market ("the Platform"). By using the Platform, you agree to comply with these Terms.
terms.s1Content:
Shark Market is an electronic technical platform that enables users to display, buy, and sell digital projects and digital assets between users.

The Platform is not the owner of any listed project and is not a party to any transaction between buyer and seller.
terms.s2Content:
The user must:
• Be 18 years of age or older
• Have full legal capacity
• Be responsible for the accuracy of the information provided
terms.s3Content:
• The Platform does not sell or purchase projects.
• The Platform does not verify the accuracy of profits or claims.
• All information is provided by the seller.
• The user bears full personal responsibility.
terms.s4Content:
The Platform does not provide investment, legal, financial, or tax advice.

Any purchase decision is solely the buyer's responsibility.
terms.s5Content:
Projects may involve operational and financial risks.

The buyer may lose the full purchase amount.

The Platform does not guarantee any returns.
terms.s6Content: The Platform has the right to suspend or delete any account that violates the Terms without prior notice.
terms.s7Content:
The seller is legally responsible for:
• Accuracy of data
• Ownership of the project
• No infringement of third-party rights

The Platform is not responsible for any false information.
terms.s8Content:
The Platform charges a service fee on successful transactions.

Fees are non-refundable after the transaction is completed.
terms.s9Content:
Any dispute between buyer and seller is resolved directly between them.

The Platform's role is limited to managing the payment service only.
terms.s10Content: The Platform is not liable for any financial, operational, or investment losses resulting from using the Platform.
terms.s11Content: The user agrees to indemnify the Platform against any legal claims arising from misuse of the Platform or violation of these Terms.
terms.s12Content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and Saudi courts have jurisdiction.

escrow.title: Escrow Policy
escrow.intro: The Platform provides a payment intermediary service to protect both parties during the transaction.
escrow.p1: The Platform is not a party to the sale.
escrow.p2: The Platform does not verify financial performance.
escrow.p3: The buyer is responsible for full due diligence.
escrow.p4: Funds are transferred to the seller after the buyer confirms receipt.
escrow.p5: In case of dispute, the Platform reviews submitted evidence without legal liability.
escrow.p6: The Platform is not responsible for losses after transaction completion.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The Platform complies with personal data protection regulations in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
privacy.dataCollectedItems:
• Name
• Email
• Phone number
• IP address
• Transaction data
privacy.useOfDataItems:
• Operating the Platform
• Identity verification
• Fraud prevention
• Service improvement
privacy.dataProtectionContent: Data is stored in secure systems and is not sold to any third party.
privacy.userRightsContent:
Users may request:
• Access to their data
• Correction
• Deletion
